mapper.update: update author_story set read_count=read_count+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id , u.nickname , u.profileimg , aus.num , aus.myid , aus.title , aus.content , aus.read_count , aus.writeday FROM usersjoin AS u RIGHT JOIN author_story AS aus ON u.id = aus.myid where num=#{num}

SELECT u.idx , u.id , u.nickname , u.profileimg , u.category , aus.num , aus.title , aus.content , aus.thumbnail_file , aus.read_count , aus.writeday FROM usersjoin AS u RIGHT JOIN author_story AS aus ON u.id = aus.myid WHERE u.category = 2 AND num order by aus.num desc limit #{start},#{perpage}
